author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r24730, remove accidental test list tweak.

author: pburba
msg: Stop inheritance and elision of mergeinfo when merging into a switched path.
(svn_wc__path_switched): New, determines if a WC path is switched.
(get_wc_merge_info): Don't inherit mergeinfo above a switched path.
(svn_client__elide_mergeinfo): Don't elide mergefinfo past a switched path.

author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to svn:mergeinfo elision implementation r24653, pass correct entry.
Pass svn_client__elide_mergeinfo() the entry for the child path with
mergeinfo being elided, *not* the switch/update anchor.

author: joeswatosh
msg: Deal with compiler warning for narrowing conversion
pieces of apr_time_t to time_t before sending to rb_time_new

author: joeswatosh
msg: Deal with compiler warning for (possible) narrowing conversion
